reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa4.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Simple EXIF/IPTC Mappings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Simple EXIF/IPTC Mappings dialog'.
Select the 'Aperture' from the 'Alt Text' drop down list.
Select the 'Title' from the 'Title Text' drop down list.
Select the 'Caption' from the 'Caption' drop down list.
Select the 'Copyright' from the 'Copyright' drop down list.
Select the 'Credit' from the 'Credit' drop down list.
Select the 'Keywords' from the 'Keywords' drop down list.
Select the 'none' from the 'Media categories' drop down list.
Select the 'Title' from the 'Media Tags' drop down list.
Select the 'Source' from the 'Source' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the Cover Media 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'NUP_155306_0046' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Verify the 'Apply Embedded Metadata' button is present.
Assert that the Title Text box value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Alt Text box value matches 'f/5.6'.
Assert that the Source box value matches 'Episodic'.
Assert that the Credit Text box value matches 'Brownie Harris/NBC'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box value matches '2013 NBCUniversal Media, LLC'.
Assert that the Keywords Text box value matches 'NUP_155306, Revolution, Episode 118, Season 1'.
Enter '' in the 'Title Text' text box.
Enter '' in the 'Source' text box.
Click the 'Apply Embedded Metadata' button.
Assert that the Title Text box value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Source box value matches 'Episodic'.
Enter 'ModifiedTitle.JPG' in the 'Title Text' text box.
Enter 'ModifiedSource' in the 'Source' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the Cover Media 'Edit' button.
Assert that the Title Text box value matches 'ModifiedTitle.JPG'.
Assert that the Source box value matches 'ModifiedSource'.
Enter '' in the 'Title Text' text box.
Enter '' in the 'Source' text box.
Click the 'Apply Embedded Metadata' button.
Assert that the Title Text box value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Source box value matches 'Episodic'.

Enter '' in the 'Source' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
